# RelativeDateTimeFormatter.UnitsStyle.abbreviated

**Case**

A style that uses abbreviated units, such as “2 mo. ago”.

## Declaration

```swift
case abbreviated
```

## Discussion

This style may give different results in languages other than English.

## Formatting Date and Time Units

- **RelativeDateTimeFormatter.UnitsStyle.full**: A style that uses full units, such as “2 months ago”.
- **RelativeDateTimeFormatter.UnitsStyle.short**: A style that uses shortened units, such as “2 mo. ago”.
- **RelativeDateTimeFormatter.UnitsStyle.spellOut**: A style that spells out units such as “two months ago”.
